data.title: Grupo Planeta, editorial, audiovisual and communication group
data.text:
Leading publishing group in Spain and Latin America

Grupo Planeta has more than 70 publishing imprints throughout the world, which publish fiction and non-fiction in Spanish, Catalan, Portuguese and Italian. Each year, it publishes more than 4000 new titles, including classical and contemporary writers, from more than 15,000 authors, in paper and digital formats. Planeta also has a wide range of international comics, manga, and Spanish authors, in printed and digital publications. The group is also the leading publisher of major reference works.

Leader in publishing in Catalan

Grup 62 is the head of a group with 12 publishing imprints and is leader in publishing in the Catalan language and a clear benchmark in publishing of fiction and nonfiction texts.

Leader in publishing collectibles and home entertainment products

The activity of Editorial Planeta DeAgostini, the result of the collaboration between Grupo Planeta and Grupo DeAgostini, which began more than 30 years ago in the field of collectibles in kiosks, has evolved with the changes in the consumer habits of the population with the use of new technologies. Thanks to the experience acquired over these years and the agreements with the main world suppliers of content, today, it is the leader in the development and distribution of collectibles and home entertainment products, which also includes scale models and hobbies in general.
